summary: A man whose wife entertains eccentric individuals, has no other choice to avoid ruin than to sell a patent on laser beams he invented...
cast: Tony Curtis|Berta Domínguez D.|Erik Estrada|Peter Lawford|Ron Moody|Donald Pleasence|Orson Welles|Christopher Chaplin|Nancy Roberts|Vladek Sheybal|Ava Lazar|Jay Benedict|Edward Burnham|Anthony Dawson|Victoria Burgoyne|Stuart D. Latham|David Baxt|Peter Poll|Sally Cranfield|Christina Artemis|Pamela Trigg|Arthur Beatty|Harry Fielder|Frank Jakeman|James Payne
title: ¿Dónde está Parsifal?
